g.text: Experienced print and electronic copyeditor, familiar with production needs and good with deadlines.
Available for full-time or part-time work, remote or on-site in the metro New York area.

text.style: fill: #ffffff; stroke: none; font-size: 21px; letter-spacing:0.3pt; text-anchor:middle; font-weight:700;

g.text: Bachelor of Science, magna cum laude
